Ambient Dreams

Audio

Ambient Dreams

A relaxing ambient track.

The Process

The track was built around a simple piano melody, layered with atmospheric pads created in Ableton Live's Wavetable synth. Field recordings of rain and wind were subtly mixed in to add natural texture. The final mix was mastered to have a wide dynamic range, ensuring a non-fatiguing listening experience.

Objective

To create a calming soundscape for a guided meditation feature.

Client

Meditation App

Tools Used

  • Ableton Live
  • Kontakt
  • Field Recorder
